name: Basic
description: Gain proficiency in one tool, musical instrument, or language

name: Combat
description: Gain proficiency in one type of armor (light, medium, or heavy), shields, or one weapon

name: Skill
description: Gain half proficiency in one skill

name: Advanced Skill
description: Gain proficiency in one skill you have half proficiency in

name: Elite Skill
description: Gain double proficiency in one skill you have proficiency in
